context: I really like Louise Lasser. Which actors are similiar to Lasser?
She was heavily influenced by Joan Rivers and Rita Rudner.

He (Woody Allen) did both write and star in To Rome, so that seems sensible.
Who else was in that movie?
Aside from Woody Allen, Judy Davis and Greta Gerwig also have star credits.
What else do I know Judy Davis from?
resp: She also starred in "The Ref" and "My Brilliant Career."
